meanings.definition: To make a duplicate printing plate by electrolytic deposition
meanings.sent1: She electrotyped the image onto the plate.
meanings.sent2: The company electrotyped more plates for the upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: The printer accidentally electrotyped the wrong image, creating a funny mistake.
meanings.sent4: Her words were electrotyped in his mind, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The process of electrotyping involves carefully transferring the design onto the plate.

meanings.definition: A duplicate printing plate made by electrolytic deposition
meanings.sent1: The electrotyped plate was used for mass production.
meanings.sent2: He examined the electrotyped plate for any imperfections.
meanings.sent3: The artist framed the electrotyped plate as a unique piece of art.
meanings.sent4: The electrotyped plate gleamed under the studio lights.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed the electrotyped plate alongside its original artwork.
